WE WORK HARD TO MAKE SOCIALISTICS THE WORLD’S MOST RESPECTED SOCIAL MEDIA AGENCY.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.7.5″ _module_preset=”default” text_font=”|300|||||||” text_text_color=”#ffffff” text_font_size=”18px” text_line_height=”1.8em” ul_line_height=”1.8em” text_font_size_tablet=”” text_font_size_phone=”16px” text_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone”]

We’re ready to re-write the rules when it comes to social media and it starts with focusing on what really matters…content. Channels and technologies evolve, change, come and go, but great content stands the test of time. If you can effectively tell your company or organization’s story across all your channels and with the right people, well, that’s marketing. Unfortunately many companies and organizations don’t have the time, money or expertise to pull it off. That’s where we hope Socialistics can fill the gap.

Socialistics is about providing an agency solution that doesn’t feel like an agency solution. We work exclusively with small and medium sized businesses and we do so affordably. Big fancy downtown office? Nope. Expensive, over-sized staff? Nah. Streamlined, results-oriented, experience at your disposal? You bet. Our team’s collective years of experience have worked towards building Socialistics by gaining a wealth of experience, a network of subject matter experts, and a business model that just plain works. No matter what the scope is of your specific marketing needs, Socialistics can help create, curate and connect your story to the world.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_image src=”https://socialistics.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/12/QUvfXetF.png” title_text=”QUvfXetF” align=”right” _builder_version=”4.7.7″ _module_preset=”default” custom_margin=”|||-21px||” custom_padding=”|||0px||”][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ disabled_on=”on|on|on” admin_label=”Social media content” _builder_version=”4.6.6″ _module_preset=”default” background_enable_color=”off” disabled=”on” locked=”off”][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_3,2_3″ _builder_version=”4.6.1″ _module_preset=”default” background_color=”#f4f8fa” border_radii=”on|10px|10px|10px|10px”][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”4.6.1″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_image src=”https://socialistics.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/10/D32A0181-2-scaled.jpg” title_text=”D32A0181-2″ align=”center” _builder_version=”4.6.6″ _module_preset=”default” custom_margin=”41px|||21px||”][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”2_3″ _builder_version=”4.6.1″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.6.6″ _module_preset=”default” text_text_color=”#0c71c3″ header_text_align=”left” header_2_text_align=”left” header_2_text_color=”#0582ca” header_2_font_size=”70px” header_2_line_height=”0.5em” custom_padding=”0px|||||” header_2_font_size_tablet=”65px” header_2_font_size_phone=”60px” header_2_font_size_last_edited=”on|desktop” locked=”off”]

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text module_class=”social-campaigns-block” _builder_version=”4.6.6″ _module_preset=”default” text_font=”Karla||||||||” text_text_color=”#747474″ link_font=”Montserrat|800||on|||||” link_text_color=”#0582ca” header_2_font=”Montserrat|800||on|||||” header_2_text_color=”#003554″ header_2_font_size=”30px” header_3_font=”Montserrat|||on|||||” header_3_text_color=”#0582ca” custom_padding_tablet=”|50px||50px|false|true” custom_padding_phone=”|40px||40px|false|true” custom_padding_last_edited=”on|phone” text_font_size_tablet=”14px” text_font_size_phone=”12px” text_font_size_last_edited=”on|desktop” link_font_size_tablet=”12px” link_font_size_phone=”” link_font_size_last_edited=”on|desktop” header_2_font_size_tablet=”28px” header_2_font_size_phone=”26px” header_2_font_size_last_edited=”on|desktop” header_3_font_size_tablet=”20px” header_3_font_size_phone=”18px” header_3_font_size_last_edited=”on|desktop” locked=”off”]

We Work Hard

We’re ready to re-write the rules when it comes to social media and it starts with focusing on what really matters…content. Channels and technologies evolve, change, come and go, but great content stands the test of time. If you can effectively tell your company or organization’s story across all your channels and with the right people, well, that’s marketing. Unfortunately many companies and organizations don’t have the time, money or expertise to pull it off. That’s where we hope Socialistics can fill the gap.

Socialistics is about providing an agency solution that doesn’t feel like an agency solution. We work exclusively with small and medium sized businesses and we do so affordably. Big fancy downtown office? Nope. Expensive, over-sized staff? Nah. Streamlined, results-oriented, experience at your disposal? You bet. Our team’s collective years of experience have worked towards building Socialistics by gaining a wealth of experience, a network of subject matter experts, and a business model that just plain works. No matter what the scope is of your specific marketing needs, Socialistics can help create, curate and connect your story to the world.

Our values.

text_font_size_last_edited=”on|desktop” link_font_size_tablet=”12px” link_font_size_phone=”” link_font_size_last_edited=”on|desktop” header_2_font_size_tablet=”28px” header_2_font_size_phone=”26px” We work hard every day to make Socialistics the world’s most respected social media agency.

We’re ready to re-write the rules when it comes to social media and it starts with focusing on what really matters…content. Channels and technologies evolve, change, come and go, but great content stands the test of time. If you can effectively tell your company or organization’s story across all your channels and with the right people, well, that’s marketing. Unfortunately many companies and organizations don’t have the time, money or expertise to pull it off. That’s where we hope Socialistics can fill the gap.

Socialistics is about providing an agency solution that doesn’t feel like an agency solution. We work exclusively with small and medium sized businesses and we do so affordably. Big fancy downtown office? Nope. Expensive, over-sized staff? Nah. Streamlined, results-oriented, experience at your disposal? You bet. Our team’s collective years of experience have worked towards building Socialistics by gaining a wealth of experience, a network of subject matter experts, and a business model that just plain works. No matter what the scope is of your specific marketing needs, Socialistics can help create, curate and connect your story to the world.

Social media that matters

About us

What makes us different you ask? We’re insatiable storytellers. At our core, our team is driven to find every client’s unique story, and tell it in such a way that it demands attention. Through written word, motion and imagery, we capture your voice, your look, your feel, and we separate you from the crowd.

We work tirelessly to tell your story through social in ways that are meaningful and measurable. We’re dreamers, strategists, & visionaries. We’re stay-at-home moms, single parents, entrepreneurs and lovers of all things story. Give us a chance to tell yours and you won’t look back.

learn more

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”4.5.6″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_blurb image=”https://socialistics.com/wp-content/uploads/2021/07/social.jpg” disabled_on=”off|off|off” admin_label=”Petra Khan” module_class=”cblurb” _builder_version=”4.9.9″ _module_preset=”default” body_font=”Crimson Text||||||||” body_text_color=”#000000″ body_font_size=”18px” background_enable_image=”off” background_position=”top_center” custom_padding=”||0px|||” hover_enabled=”0″ body_font_size_tablet=”” body_font_size_phone=”14px” body_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” title_text=”social” sticky_enabled=”0″]

Petra has six years of social media marketing experience and has worked with clients in various industries ranging from hospitality, sports and recreation, government, and higher education. Her goal is to foster a relationship between her clients and their respective audiences. She also is a major animal lover and welcomes any pictures of your pets!

[/et_pb_blurb][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.9.9″ _module_preset=”default” text_font=”|600|||||||” header_4_font=”Montserrat|700|||||||”]

Petra Khan

Account Manager
Favorite Charity: American Society for the Prevention of Cruelty to Animals

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_3,1_3,1_3″ disabled_on=”off|off|off” _builder_version=”4.9.3″ _module_preset=”default” collapsed=”off”][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”4.5.6″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_blurb image=”https://socialistics.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/11/heather_mccluskey-scaled.jpg” image_max_width=”97%” disabled_on=”off|off|off” module_class=”cblurb” _builder_version=”4.6.6″ _module_preset=”default” body_font=”Crimson Text||||||||” body_text_color=”#000000″ body_font_size=”18px” background_enable_image=”off” background_position=”top_center” custom_padding=”||0px|||” body_font_size_tablet=”” body_font_size_phone=”14px” body_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone”]

Heather has had 3 years of experience in Facebook and other major media platforms. Her studies include a bachelor’s degree in Integrated Advertising and Communications. Her focus is on building out measurable success for her clients through various ad platforms.

[/et_pb_blurb][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.9.4″ _module_preset=”default” text_font=”|600|||||||” header_4_font=”Montserrat|700|||||||”]

Heather McCluskey

Paid Media Specialist
Favorite Charity: No Kid Hungry[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”4.5.6″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_blurb image=”https://socialistics.com/wp-content/uploads/2021/03/stasia.jpeg” disabled_on=”off|off|off” module_class=”cblurb” _builder_version=”4.9.2″ _module_preset=”default” body_font=”Crimson Text||||||||” body_text_color=”#000000″ body_font_size=”18px” background_enable_image=”off” background_position=”top_center” custom_padding=”||0px|||” body_font_size_tablet=”” body_font_size_phone=”14px” body_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone”]

Stasia brings a client focused mentality with experience ranging from a startup environment to the NHL. She is a PNW girl to her core with strong allegiances to the Seattle sports teams. Outside of market coordinating, she is project manager to her loving husband and 3 children.”

[/et_pb_blurb][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.9.2″ _module_preset=”default” text_font=”|600|||||||” header_4_font=”Montserrat|700|||||||”]

Stasia Shin

Marketing Coordinator
Favorite Charity: JDRF

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”4.5.6″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_blurb image=”https://socialistics.com/wp-content/uploads/2021/06/download.jpeg” disabled_on=”off|off|off” module_class=”cblurb” _builder_version=”4.9.7″ _module_preset=”default” body_font=”Crimson Text||||||||” body_text_color=”#000000″ body_font_size=”18px” background_enable_image=”off” background_position=”top_center” custom_padding=”||0px|||” body_font_size_tablet=”” body_font_size_phone=”14px” body_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone”]

Ava has 3+ years of experience in paid social media and has worked with clients in and throughout Indonesia, Norway, Australia, The United States, and beyond.
Her goal is to truly assist each client by connecting with not only their personal mission but also bring people to their platform who resonate with it.

[/et_pb_blurb][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.9.7″ _module_preset=”default” text_font=”|600|||||||” header_4_font=”Montserrat|700|||||||”]

Ava Leach

Account Manager
Favorite Charity: End It Movement

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”3_4,1_4″ make_equal=”on” disabled_on=”on|on|on” _builder_version=”4.6.6″ _module_preset=”default” background_color=”#333333″ max_width=”860px” custom_margin=”60px|auto||auto|false|false” custom_padding=”40px|40px|40px|40px|true|true” custom_css_main_element=”align-items:center;” border_radii=”on|20px|20px|20px|20px” disabled=”on”][et_pb_column type=”3_4″ _builder_version=”4.6.6″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.6.1″ _module_preset=”default” text_font=”|300|||||||” text_text_color=”#ffffff” header_text_color=”#ffffff” header_3_font=”|700|||||||” header_3_text_color=”#ffffff” header_3_font_size=”30px” header_3_line_height=”1.4em” header_5_font=”Montserrat|700||on|||||” header_5_text_color=”#ffffff” header_5_letter_spacing=”2px” header_5_line_height=”1.4em” max_width=”400px” custom_margin=”||11px|||” custom_padding=”||||false|false” header_text_align_tablet=”” header_text_align_phone=”” header_text_align_last_edited=”on|phone” text_orientation_tablet=”” text_orientation_phone=”center” text_orientation_last_edited=”on|phone”]

Get In Touch With Us

If you would like more information about our services, contact us today.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_4″ _builder_version=”4.6.6″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_button button_url=”/contact/” button_text=”Contact Us” button_alignment=”center” _builder_version=”4.6.1″ _module_preset=”default” custom_button=”on” button_text_size=”14px” button_text_color=”#ffffff” button_bg_color=”#0070c7″ button_border_width=”10px” button_border_color=”#0070c7″ button_border_radius=”30px” button_letter_spacing=”1px” button_font=”Montserrat|700||on|||||” custom_margin=”||15px|||” locked=”off”][/et_pb_button][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section]

excerpt.rendered: ….. About – Socialistics -A Social Media Agency ready for your social media to actually work? Contact us today for a no obligation social media assessment. contact us WE WORK HARD TO MAKE SOCIALISTICS THE WORLD’S MOST RESPECTED SOCIAL MEDIA AGENCY. We’re ready to re-write the rules when it comes to social media and it […]
